HERO-SECTION-TITLE:
your hair.
your style.
your story.
INTRO-TEXT: a haircut with me isn’t just routine — it’s an experience. I love good vibes, precise fades, and seeing clients leave with a smile. I don’t believe in templates. Every hairstyle is unique, just like the person wearing it. If you're looking for a fresh style that’s truly tailored to you, you’re in the right place!
